text: Fires of Innocence is a 1922 British silent drama film directed by Sidney Morgan and starring Joan Morgan, Bobby Andrews and Arthur Lennard. It was based on George Stevenson's novel A Little World Apart. ==Cast== * Joan Morgan as Helen Dalmaine * Bobbie Andrews as Arthur Dalmaine * Arthur Lennard as Rev. Dalmaine * Marie Illington as Lady Crane * Madge Tree as Bella Blackburn * Nell Emerald as Lydia Blackburn ==References== ==Bibliography== * Low, Rachael. The History of the British Film 1918-1929.
